name: STORM THE MASTER ROOM
description:
PLAYTIME AIN'T OVER

A one-man army consisting of a Toy Soldier and his Tank against a whole platoon of plastic bad guys, all in a fight to reclaim the MASTER ROOM!

Solve puzzles and engage in challenging combat switching between on-foot and vehicular gameplay. 

(Made for the Sidequest Gamejam)

Controls

Soldier:

A D to move

SPACE to shoot/reload pistol

S to duck

W to jump

E to interact with objects (Get in the Tank)

Tank:

A D to move

SPACE to shoot

W to move the Tank's nose left

S to move the Tank's nose right

E to get out of the tank.

OTHER STUFF

Made on Construct 3

Sounds made with BFXR
